entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 12:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow with periods of ice pellets early this afternoon and with periods of rain late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
